pullRequest.title: Mark hono.registry.rest property prefix as deprecated
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added support for using hono.registry.http for configuring the file
based registry's HTTP endpoint instead. The old prefix is still
supported but marked as deprecated.

commit.message:
Mark hono.registry.rest property prefix as deprecated

Added support for using hono.registry.http for configuring the file
based registry's HTTP endpoint instead. The old prefix is still
supported but marked as deprecated.

Signed-off-by: Kai Hudalla <kai.hudalla@bosch.io>

nodes.bodyText: Superfluous comma after "both". And using either "both" or "as well as", not both together, seems better style to me.
